participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and innovative, Alex enjoys working on complex projects and prefers solitary activities.
participant_1.background: I am working on a building a robot to be my body double. I am a recluse. I helped design the game Starcraft. I have an allergy to water. I am a famous twitch streamer.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and imaginative, Emily loves adventure and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I am in the third grade. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I play with my friends on the playground. I love to go to Disney World every year.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play with my friends on the playground, and I love going to Disney World every year!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm a recluse, so I don't get out much. I'm working on building a robot to be my body double, so I can finally go outside!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to build a robot!
Me too! I'm hoping to have it finished by the end of the year.
That would be so amazing! I can't wait to see it!
Thanks! I'll send you pictures when it's done.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to watch cartoons, and my favorite character is Mickey Mouse!
Mickey Mouse is a classic! I love the old cartoons.
I'm glad we have something in common!
